entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 07 January 2023
